clauses.title: You aren’t allowed to remove or edit user-generated content
clauses.description: You cannot edit or remove your content from this service.
clauses.clause_text: IKEA does not guarantee that you will have any recourse through IKEA to edit or delete any content you have submitted.

case.text: You aren’t allowed to remove or edit user-generated content

clauses.title: This service may collect, use, and share location data
clauses.description: Location-based information is collected and may be used and/or shared with third parties for purposes not directly related to the services provided (i.e. the Service doesn't rely on the use or share of location data to function properly).
clauses.clause_text: With your permission, we may also collect your precise location data.

case.text: This service may collect, use, and share location data

clauses.title: Third-party cookies are used for advertising
clauses.description: The service's website sets third-party cookies (cookies that do not belong to their domain) for purposes not including statistics and analytics.
clauses.clause_text: We use pixels and cookies in our work with customer database hosting providers, marketing agencies and advertising partners to place relevant content and advertisements for you on our own websites and apps,

case.text: Third-party cookies are used for advertising

clauses.title: User-generated content can be blocked or censored for any reason
clauses.description: The service reserves the right, for any or no reason, to refuse to post or reject user communications.
clauses.clause_text: However, IKEA reserves the right to remove or to refuse to post any submission for any reason.

case.text: User-generated content can be blocked or censored for any reason

clauses.title: Your account can be deleted without prior notice and without a reason
clauses.description: At any time, your account can be terminated without explanation and without warning by the service.
clauses.clause_text: You or we may suspend or terminate your accounts or your use of the Services at any time, for any reason or for no reason.

case.text: Your account can be deleted or permanently suspended without prior notice and without a reason

clauses.title: You are being tracked via social media cookies/pixels
clauses.description: These types of cookies/pixels send information to social media sites when you interact with the service.
clauses.clause_text:
Targeting cookies are used to:

  • Allow you to share and like

case.text: You are being tracked via social media cookies/pixels

clauses.title: This service gathers information about you through third parties
clauses.description: This Service may employ, either identifiable or non-identifiable, data collection from third party sources about you.
clauses.clause_text: Third parties may also provide us with additional publicly available information about you.

case.text: Information is gathered about you through third parties

clauses.title: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes
clauses.description: The service may use your personal data for marketing, such as sending you personalised offerings.
clauses.clause_text: Providing you with marketing material via SMS, mail and email (with your consent where required by law)

case.text: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes

clauses.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels and device fingerprinting
clauses.description: Tracking technologies (such as web beacons, tracking pixels...) are employed on users and/or the service assigns a unique ID to a browser or device to track its behaviour.
clauses.clause_text: We use pixels and cookies

case.text: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting

clauses.title: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction
clauses.description: If the service gets acquired or is involved in a merger, bankruptcy, reorganisation or sale, your personal data may be transferred or sold.
clauses.clause_text: We may share your personal information in the event we sell or transfer all or a portion of our business or assets

case.text: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction

clauses.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation
clauses.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties essential to the service’s operation. This could be an external spam detection service for an internet forum.
clauses.clause_text: In order for us to provide our products and services to you, we share some of your personal information with trusted third-party service providers

case.text: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation

clauses.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world
clauses.description: Your data is stored all over the world, including in countries where data protection rules may differ from the ones of the service's jurisdiction or those of your country jurisdiction.
clauses.clause_text: Your personal information may be stored and processed by our vendors and service providers in the United States or other locations where the service providers or IKEA have facilities.

case.text: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

clauses.title: Tracking pixels are used in service-to-user communication
clauses.description: The service tracks the user count or some actions of the user; this is usually used for statistics. For example, emails sent by a service can contain a pixel tag, which is a small, clear image that can tell them whether or not you have opened an email and what your IP address is.
clauses.clause_text: how you interact with the emails we send you

case.text: Tracking pixels are used in service-to-user communication

clauses.title: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data
clauses.description: Users have the right to access personal data hold by the Service, correct it and/or permanently delete it. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text:
To exercise the access, data portability, and deletion rights described above, California residents may submit a verifiable consumer request to us by either:

  • Calling us at 1-888-888-4532
  • Submitting an online request here
  • Requesting a submission card in-person at one of our California stores.

case.text: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data

clauses.title: The service provides information about how they collect personal data
clauses.description: The service details situations in which they collect personal information or means by which they do.
clauses.clause_text: This Privacy Policy sets out how and why IKEA North America Services, LLC (“IKEA”, “we,” “our,” or “us”) collect, store, process and share your personal information.

case.text: Information is provided about how they collect personal data

clauses.title: This service does not sell your personal data
clauses.description: This service makes an explicit promise not to sell "personal data" of users.
clauses.clause_text: We do not sell personal information to third parties.

case.text: Your personal data is not sold

clauses.title: The service claims to be CCPA compliant for California users
clauses.description: The service has a different behavior towards users protected by the California Consumer Privacy Act.
clauses.clause_text: DATA PORTABILITY RIGHTS FOR CALIFORNIA RESIDENTS

case.text: The service claims to be CCPA compliant for California users

clauses.title: You can opt out of promotional communications
clauses.description: You can update your account preferences and/or easily unsubscribe of email/sms lists to stop receiving promotional communications.
clauses.clause_text: ou may opt-out of receiving marketing messages by using the opt-out mechanisms and links provided in each message.

case.text: You can opt out of promotional communications

clauses.title: You should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify
clauses.description: The service may update the Terms without notice, but if they significantly change the agreements in a manner that importantly and/or negatively affects the way the service is used, users will be notified.
clauses.clause_text: If we change this Privacy Policy in a material way, we will provide appropriate notice to you.

case.text: You should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify

clauses.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements (Terms: September 2020)
clauses.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.
clauses.clause_text: Effective Date: September 2020

case.text: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

clauses.title: Your content can be deleted if you violate the terms
clauses.description: Content infringing the Terms of Service (or the Acceptable Use Policy or equivalent) may be removed, with or without notice.
clauses.clause_text: IKEA reserves the right to change, condense or delete any content on IKEA’s website that IKEA deems, in its sole discretion, to violate the content guidelines or any other provision of these Terms of Use.

case.text: Your content can be deleted if you violate the terms

clauses.title: This service is only available to users of a certain age
clauses.description: The Services are intended for users who are at least a certain age. If you are younger than the age required then you are prohibited from using the Service.
clauses.clause_text: We do not knowingly allow children to order our products, communicate with us, or use any of our online services.

case.text: This service is only available to users over a certain age

clauses.title: Only aggregate data is given to third parties
clauses.description:
The Service only shares your information in an aggregated form, which means an anonymized form
that can't be linked to a unique identity.
clauses.clause_text: We also disclose non-private, deidentified, aggregate or otherwise non-personal information with third parties, including social media companies like Facebook and Twitter, and online advertising companies like Google, to deliver targeted advertising about other products and services for marketing purposes.

case.text: Only aggregate data is given to third parties

clauses.title: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
clauses.clause_text:
We may collect the following information:

  • Internet Protocol (IP) address

case.text: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location

clauses.title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.
clauses.description: Even though the Do Not Track (DNT) header was not implemented perfectly, services should not track users whose browsers send a DNT header.
clauses.clause_text: We therefore do not respond to browser Do Not Track signals.

case.text: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.
